arabicText: فَلَمْ تَقْتُلُوهُمْ وَلَـٰكِنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَتَلَهُمْ ۚ وَمَا رَمَيْتَ إِذْ رَمَيْتَ وَلَـٰكِنَّ ٱللَّهَ رَمَىٰ ۚ وَلِيُبْلِىَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ مِنْهُ بَلَآءً حَسَنًا ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
So	you	did	not	slay	them,	but	in	fact	Allah
slew	 them;	 and	 O	 dear	 Prophet	
(Muhammad - peace	and	blessings	be	upon	
him)	 you	 did	 not	 throw	(the	 sand)	 when	
you	did	throw,	but	in	fact	Allah threw;	and	
in	 order	 to	 bestow	 an	 excellent	 reward	
upon	 the	Muslims;	indeed	Allah is	 the	All	
Hearing,	the	All	Knowing
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	tum	ne	unheiñ	qatl	na	kiya	balke	Allah	
ne	unheiñ		qatl	kiya	aur	aey	Mehboob' Woh	
khāk	jo	 tum	ne	pheñki	 tum	ne	na	pheñki	
thi	 balke	 Allah	 ne	 pheñki	 aur	 is	 liye	 ke	
musalmanoñ	 ko	 is	 se	 achchha	 in’ām	 ‘aṭa	
farmaye	be-shak	Allah	sunta	jānta	hai.

arabicText: ذَٰلِكُمْ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مُوهِنُ كَيْدِ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Therefore	take	this,	and	(know	that)	Allah
will	 weaken	 the	 scheme	 of	 the	
disbelievers.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yeh	 to	 lo	 aur	 iske	 sāth	 yeh	 hai	 ke	 Allah	
kāfiroñ		ka	dāoñ	sust	karne	wāla	hai	.

arabicText: إِن تَسْتَفْتِحُوا۟ فَقَدْ جَآءَكُمُ ٱلْفَتْحُ ۖ وَإِن تَنتَهُوا۟ فَهُوَ خَيْرٌۭ لَّكُمْ ۖ وَإِن تَعُودُوا۟ نَعُدْ وَلَن تُغْنِىَ عَنكُمْ فِئَتُكُمْ شَيْـًۭٔا وَلَوْ كَثُرَتْ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
O	 disbelievers!	 If	 you	 seek	 a	 judgement,	
then	this	judgement	has	come	to	you;	and	
if	you	desist,	it	is	better	for	you;	and	if	you	
return	 to	 mischief,	 We	 will	 punish	 you	
again;	and	 your	populace	will	not	benefit	
you,	however	large	it	may	be	- and	besides	
this,	Allah is	with	the	Muslims.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	 kāfiro' Agar	 tum	 faisla	māñgte	 ho	 to	
yeh	 faisla	tum	par	āa	chuka	aur	agar	b’az	
āao	to	tumhāra	bhalā	hai	aur	agar	tum	phir	
sharārat	karo	to	hum	phir	sazā	deñge	aur	
tumhāra	 jath-tha	 (Giroh)	 tumheiñ	 kuchh	
kām	na	dega	chāhe	kitna	hi	bahut	ho	aur	
iske	sāth	yeh	hai	ke	Allah	musalmanoñ	ke	
sāth	ha.

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ أَطِيعُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ وَلَا تَوَلَّوْا۟ عَنْهُ وَأَنتُمْ تَسْمَعُونَ
englishTranslationText:
O	People	who	Believe!	Obey	Allah and	His	
Noble	 Messenger,	 and	 do	 not	 turn	 away	
from	him	after	you	have	heard	him	speak.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	 Imān	wālo' Allah	aur	uske	Rasool	 ka	
ḥukm	 māno	 aur	 sun	 suna	 kar	 us	 se	 na	
phiro	.

arabicText: وَلَا تَكُونُوا۟ كَٱلَّذِينَ قَالُوا۟ سَمِعْنَا وَهُمْ لَا يَسْمَعُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 do	 not	 be	 like	 those	 who	 said,	 “We	
have	heard”,	whereas	they	do	not	hear.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	un	jaise	na	hoña	Jinhoñ	ne	kahā	hum	
ne	suna	aur	woh	nahi	sunte

arabicText: ۞ إِنَّ شَرَّ ٱلدَّوَآبِّ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلصُّمُّ ٱلْبُكْمُ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعْقِلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	 the	 worst	 beasts	 in	 the	 sight	 of	
Allah are	 those	 (people)	 who	 are	 deaf,	
dumb	- who	do	not	have	any	sense.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak	sab	jānwaroñ	meiñ	bad-tar	Allah	
ke	nazdeek	woh	haiñ	jo	behre	gooñge	haiñ	
jinko	‘aql	nahi

arabicText: وَلَوْ عَلِمَ ٱللَّهُ فِيهِمْ خَيْرًۭا لَّأَسْمَعَهُمْ ۖ وَلَوْ أَسْمَعَهُمْ لَتَوَلَّوا۟ وَّهُم مُّعْرِضُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	had	Allah found	any	goodness	in	them,	He	would	have	made	them	hear;	and	had	He	made	
them	hear	they	would,	in	the	end,	have	turned	away	and	gone	back.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	agar	Allah	un	meiñ	kuchh	bhalāyi	jānta	to	unheiñ		suna	deta	aur	agar	suna	deta	jab	bhi	anjām	
kār	moñh	pher	kar	palat	jāte

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱسْتَجِيبُوا۟ لِلَّهِ وَلِلرَّسُولِ إِذَا دَعَاكُمْ لِمَا يُحْيِيكُمْ ۖ وَٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَحُولُ بَيْنَ ٱلْمَرْءِ وَقَلْبِهِۦ وَأَنَّهُۥٓ إِلَيْهِ تُحْشَرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
O	People	who	Believe!	Present	yourselves	upon	the	command	of	Allah and	His	Noble	Messenger,	
when	the	Noble	Messenger	calls	you	towards	the	matter	that	will	bestow	you	life;	and	know	that	
the	command	of	Allah becomes	a	barrier	between	a	man	and	his	heart’s	intentions,	and	that	you	
will	all	be	raised	towards	Him.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	 Imān	wālo' Allah	aur	Rasool	 ke	 bulāne	 par hāzir	 ho	jab	Rasool	 tumheiñ	 us	 cheez	 ke	liye	
bulayeñ	jo	tumheiñ	zindagi	bakhshe	gi	aur	jān	lo	ke	Allah	ka	ḥukm	āadmi	aur	uske	dili	irādoñ	
meiñ	hāyil	ho	jāta	hai	aur	yeh	ke	tumheiñ	usi	ki	taraf	uthna	hai	.
